products.title: Splash Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Splash cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Their splash cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Oyster Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee providing additional peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Oyster Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The splash oyster electric roller blind is a very light, natural cream colour. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces and look beautiful when matched with woods throughout the home. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately).

products.title: Splash Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. This splash dove grey electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior.

products.title: Splash Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This cream electric roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This electric roller blind with accompanying white components and cream fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.
